DOC.brief_title: Pilot Trial Test Nutrition Application Making Smart Healthy Choices
DOC.detailed_description: An innovative nutritional application ( App ) entitle `` MyNutriCart '' develop create list food beverages help individual make smart healthy choice purchase food grocery store base Dietary Guidelines Americans . A pilot randomize clinical trial do test effectiveness App food selection purchase , dietary pattern , weight loss two month intervention . We also assess feasibility , usability , satisfaction acceptability App . A total 138 overweight obese adult age 21-45 year old Smartphone invite participate study . Participants randomize two group ; ( 1 ) intervention group use App , generate healthy grocery list use purchase food supermarket ; ( 2 ) control group traditional intervention nutritionist . To assess impact intervention dietary pattern , participant complete three 24-hour dietary recall , short food frequency questionnaire ( FFQ ) provide grocery receipt baseline end study ( 8 week later ) . Weight height also perform intervention . Feasibility , usability , satisfaction , acceptability nutrition App assess end study use questionnaire .
